channel.title: Projects on Adrián Benítez Merino
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Adrián Benítez Merino

item.title: IMAGEN
item.description:
Visit the GitHub repo.

Description

IMAGEN is a language processor project built using Lex (Flex) and Yacc (Bison). It serves as an educational resource for learning about compiler design, formal grammars, and parsing techniques.

item.title: undersounds
item.description:
Visit the GitHub repo.

Description

A feature-complete music platform developed as an introduction to core concepts of web development, such as user authentification, database integration, and API handling. Built with Next.js, FastAPI and Firebase.
